rComments: Best prof at uottawa. He genuinely cares about his students and is passionate about what he teaches in his lectures

Amazing dude, really interesting material but really heavy lectures. Guy knows what he's doing though cause I still went to every single class. Grading criteria are pretty strict but I don't hold that against him cuz he knows his stuff and he's passionate about what he teaches to the point where it is contagious.

Hes a nice guy but his lectures are so long. Bit of an overwhelming course in terms of readings (almost 100 pages a week) but he knows what hes talking about. Class is only graded by a 40% midterm and 60% final which is stressful

eugene is a complete G. my mental health was at its lowest last semester and i couldnt even bring myself to write the final paper (was supposed to be about 10-12 pages), and so i sent him an email apologizing for handing in barely anything for the final and he still passed me with a D, when i was prob at a 30 in that class. really cares!

Hands down one of my all time favourite professors and class I've ever taken. Lecture heavy but the content and the way he gives the lectures made it interesting I actually enjoyed going to his classes. If you have a general understanding of the concepts and can make links between them you'll get a good mark, he's very clear with what is important

He is such a sweetheart. So kind and caring, and extremely knowledgeable on the topic of drug policy. He really makes it interesting by drawing on current events. I would 100% recommend taking this class!

Prof. Oscapella is the best professor I've had at UOttawa. Hands. Down. He is so passionate and knowledgeable about drug reform that it's motivated me to go into drug policy. Definitely need to go to class as attendance is 10% but I actually looked forward to going to class every week!
Lots of reading, lots to study, all worth it

One of the best professors at the university!  His lectures are amazing and very engaging. Out of all the classes i've taken so far I have learned the most in this class. His exams are a little tough but as long as you do all the readings and show up to class you will get a fair mark. I highly recommend to take a course with him.
Awesome prof! I highly recommend you take his course - he is SO smart and presents really interesting stuff.
Amazing lecture, must do!

This was by far the best class I took at UofO! Should be mandatory.. Oscapella is so passionate about what he does & it shows! Midterm was pretty hard, but if you do the readings & attend class you will do great! The course itself is super interesting & he is so knowledgable. Overall an amazing class!

BEST TEACHER I'VE ENCOUNTERED AT U OF O HE'S DEEPLY PASSIONATE IS WHAT HE DOES. HIS MIDTERM IS LITTLE HARD AND READINGS ARE A LITTLE LONG,HOWEVER THE FINAL MAKES UP FOR IT. HE'S FUNNY, MEDIA PRESENTATION ARE INTERESTING AND AN OVERALL NICE TEACHER. BEST CLASS I'VE TAKEN SO FAR AT U OF O
This professor is excellent! In my university career, I learned the most from this class. Work hard, and get a good fair grade at the end.

Absolutely amazing professor. Attendance is mandatory - there is a sign in sheet for most classes. His midterm is tough, but if you make notes from the readings, and dig through the important parts in his lectures, you'll end up doing okay in the end. The final exam will salvage your mark.

I LOVED this class. I recommend this class to everyone! Oscapella is exceptionally knowledgeable, and clearly very passionate about criminal justice and drugs. He is extremely helpful, and very willing to answer any questions. And unlike other prof's, he is willing to hear opinions contrary to his own. This was definitely my favourite class at uO!

One of the most dedicated profs I have ever experienced. He is so passionate about educating society on drug policy, and it had really opened my eyes on laws. I highly recommend this class, though you will not receive a good mark.. He is very specific on answers, if you miss class you are screwed. A lot of information to take in and remember!

Amazzzzzing man and professor. The degree of work he has put into the field of irrational drug policy is unbelievable. Just listening to him speak is enjoyable. Best class at the University of Ottawa.

Everything everyone is saying is true! Great prof teaching a phenomenal class... Midterm is tough but don't get discouraged, exam is marked a lot easier to make up for lost marks. You'd be crazy not to take this class! By far the most interesting class at the U of O!

VERY VERY VERY INSPIRING. Watch out the mid-term exam is tough... be very straightforward with your answers and do not leave anything beyond and you should be okay. The class is interesting however repetitive but if you actually put effort into the class youll get an A.

Loved this professor and loved this class! He turned me into quite the drug policy debater with my friends. An expert on the topic and very clear in his lecture. Midterm is difficult as he wants specific answers but the course is still definately work taking just for an eye-opening experience. He's cute for an old guy too :P

Best professor at U of O teaching the best class at U of O. It should be mandatory for every student on campus to take Crime and Drugs. He has made me want to base my career around this topic. Very inspiring, excellent lecturer.
you need to be very specific when answering questions on his mid-terms. if you dont give him the answer he wants you don't get any points at all.

Very good prof. His passion for his work and his extensive knowledge about his field offer great insight into the failure of the drug war. The midterm (marked by TAs) was rough, but he offers a fair chance to improve your mark on the final. Great Prof! Take this class!

Epic class. Have made use of his course pack for 4 papers in different courses. Is even willing to give you additional information if you're writing on the subject. Midterm is a bit of a surprise so make sure you study specifics but final is essay format-very fair. So passionate about the material and so anti-Harper you can't help but love him.

Phenomenal. Graduated in 2005, but use his lecture material all the time to shut people up re: the war on drugs and how it should be fought. Make sure you are THOROUGH when you study for the midterm and final!
Best crim prof at U of O hands down.  Doesn't rely solely on theoretical BS, but uses first hand relevant issues.

Out of three years at this university, I have never had a class where the teacher was so dedicated to what he was teaching the students. I actually learned something meaningful instead of just regurgitating text and slides. Amazing class, best CRM class offered here
If you have the opportunity to take his drug class DO IT! Amazing prof!

Awesome class! I am sooo happy that I took it, I may not have had the best mark but it was still worth every second of my time! I wish he taught more classes here because I could listen and look at that man alll day ;)

Really cool course! And he taught it SOOO well. Never got bored once. He really gave a different perspective on the drug war and it's hard not to agree with his logic. He's clearly well respected too because cbc and various other news organization are always wanting his opinion. Take this course if you can!

One of the best courses I've ever taken. He really presesnts another point of view regarding the 'war on drugs'. Material is so interesting and his 3 hour lectures just fly by. And, he's a pretty nice looking older man, nice to look at. TAKE THIS CLASS!!

There's a reason no one has anything bad to say about him - he's a good lecturer.  It's one thing to know content and another to teach; he can do both.  Even in 3-hour courses the time goes by quickly because his use of A/V materials really grab one's attention and help prove his arguments.  Smart guy, approachable too.
heavy readings, but oscapella presents an amazing class. if you work at it, the whole thing is a beeze. fascinating lecturer.
WoW...WHaT A pRof!! hE WaS dAmmmm NicE & gOooD...BUt he KILLLLLED IT wItH thE FINAl...thAt wAs haRddddd & LOnG!! But HE WAS GREATTTTTTT!!!
Changed my entire view re: the War on Drugs.  Fabulous prof.
Great Class, but I wasn't too impressed with the final exam. Way Too Long!
had him last year, great guy, enthusiastic and very helpful, knows his stuff
Captivating, very knowledgable prof. Does repeat a bit.
Very good class - a little repetitive, but interesting
